name: A Simple Platformer Game
description:
LCM Games Presents "A Simple Platformer Game" for play on your personal computer system.

Did you know???  Many timeless arcade and console games had a "kill screen" which would happen because people would play the game longer than the programmers intended them to, and the game would just implode into itself until it turned into a big mess of glitchy pathetic code rubble! #betterthanthedev
